clozeQuestions.fullText: George Washington was the first president of the United States.
Donald Trump is the current President of the United States.
There are 27 amendments to the U.S. Constitution
A U.S. Senator is elected for 6 years
The first ten amendments to the Constitution are known as the Bill of Rights
The Supreme Court is the highest court in the United States
John Roberts is the Chief Justice of the United States
Springfield is the capital of Illinois
Independence Day is celebrated on July 4
Woodrow Wilson was President of the United States during World War I
